#summary LifeCycle of SwingFactory

|| Annotation || Description ||
|| UiPreInit || Method to be called before any field is initialized ||
|| Init || Method to be called after all field is initialized ||

{{{
class MyFrame extends JFrame {

    JTextArea textarea;
    
    
    @UiPreInit
    void preInit () {
        // this method will be call after MyFrame is created, but before textarea (and any other Component) is created.
    }

    @UiInit
    void init () {
        // this method will be call after textarea (and any other Component) is created.
    }

}
}}}
